summary: Machine learning engineer with experience in AI technology for speech recognition, audio processing, and conversational AI applications.

work_history.description: Senior ML engineer. Developed AI technology for speech recognition and interpretation of meaning and its components: Artificial speech recognition ASR, text-to-speech conversion, NLP for processing natural language. Trained models for conversational AI applications for telemarketing, collection and HR departments.

Trained deep audio model (cnn). Audio, Image, Video watermarking. Preprocessing, postprocessing audio. Research in deep audio processing. Developed CNNs, preprocessing and postprocessing algorithms for complex number.

work_history.role: Ведущий эксперт департамента разработки и развития роботизаций
work_history.description: Studied AI technology for speech recognition and interpretation of meaning and its components: Artificial speech recognition ASR, text-to-speech conversion, NLU for natural language understanding and NLP for processing natural language. Built conversational AI applications for telemarketing, collection and HR departments. Analysis of the texts of the 'client-operator' and 'client-bot' dialogs: highlighting the structure and building the logic. Development, design, testing of bots on a specialized platform. Support and refinement of existing bots. Interaction with IT-specialists on the technical capabilities of the bot and work automation. Interaction with the customer of the project on the development of the bot. Reporting on the results of customer calls in MS Excel. Working with data in MSSQL.

work_history.role: Сотрудник по договору для построения математического модели для определения мошенничества
work_history.description: Built a mathematical model for fraud detection, worked with PL SQL, SAS miner, power bi.

education.degree: Бакалавр in Machine learning and Data science
